channel.title: Taxonomy on YMCA Website Services
channel.description: Recent content in Taxonomy on YMCA Website Services

item.title: Amenities
item.description: This is a vocabulary that will be used for adding reference Branch amenities. We will use this for the Branch. Machine_name: amenities

item.title: Area
item.description: This is a vocabulary that will be used for adding location areas on the site. We will use this for the Location Branch and Facility CTs. Machine_name: area

item.title: Blog Category
item.description: This is a vocabulary that will be used for adding blog categories on the site. Machine_name: blog_category

item.title: Color
item.description: This is a vocabulary that will be used for adding colors on the site. Machine_name: color Fields Name Machine name Required Description Name drupal’s default Yes Color name. Color field_color Yes Color selector.

item.title: Facility Type
item.description: This is a vocabulary that will be used for adding facility type on the site. We will use this for the Facility CT. Machine name: facility_type

item.title: Media Tags
item.description: This is a vocabulary that will be used for adding media tags that will allow you to structure your media assets library. Machine name: media_tags

item.title: News Category
item.description: This is a vocabulary that will be used for adding news categories on the site. Machine_name: news_category
